"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/545de25f636872250dcc0100#post_545de25f636872250dcc0100
If the people defending her claimed the person consented it would be another matter that would raise questions about what qualifies as consent, but if you're rich enough or such you're suddenly untouchable.

Dumb question: why is it that every time a issue is national or something has enough attention the people involved all of a sudden go full idiot mode and start ushering verbal diarrhea?

I've heard that many people tend to think with their emotions first rather than going into deep thought on a subject. Supposedly education is a factor in this. Whether or not this is bunk, I am not sure.
